dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: These 5 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks Make Up 28.8% of the Entire S&P 500 Index
News Content: These 5 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks Make Up 28.8% of the Entire S&P 500 Index

Next I will provide you some predictions of stock price movement probabilities by others in the previous rounds.
Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.
Previous predictions:
Round: 0
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.65, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.35
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.5, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.5
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.52, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.48
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.5, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.5
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.55, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.45
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: -1, Prediction of stock price falling: -1
Round: 1
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.58, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.42
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.53, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.47
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.58, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.42
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.6, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.57, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.43
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.72, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.28
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.53, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.47


Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

```json
{
  "reasoning": "The news headline suggests that Apple Inc. (AAPL) is a significant player in the AI sector, given that it is part of the S&P 500 index and contributes substantially to it. This information, combined with the previous predictions from various models, indicates a generally positive sentiment towards AAPL. Most models predict a higher chance of the stock price rising than falling, with probabilities ranging from 0.5 to 0.72 for a rise and 0.28 to 0.5 for a fall. The presence of AAPL in a list of influential AI stocks and its significant weight in the S&P 500 index could imply that its stock price is likely to be positively affected, given the growing importance of AI in the tech sector. However, the wide range of predictions (from 0.5 to 0.72 for a rise) suggests some uncertainty. Considering the overall positive trend and the significance of AI stocks in the current market, I estimate a slightly higher probability of the stock price rising than falling.",
  "company_name": "Apple Inc.",
  "company_symbol": "AAPL",
  "news_headline": "These 5 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks Make Up 28.8% of the Entire S&P 500 Index",
  "probability_of_stock_price_rise": 0.56,
  "probability_of_stock_price_fall": 0.44
}
```
